016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.jsonapi.resources;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.context.DomainEventMetadata;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.context.DomainContext;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.entity.Command;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.*;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.Error;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.Metadata;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.util.UUIDs;
025import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
026import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
027import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
028import jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolation;
029import jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolationException;
030import jakarta.ws.rs.BadRequestException;
031import jakarta.ws.rs.NotFoundException;
032import jakarta.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders;
033import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
034import jakarta.ws.rs.core.UriBuilder;
035
036import java.io.IOException;
037import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
038import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
039import java.util.function.Consumer;
040import java.util.function.Predicate;
041
042import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.JsonApiRels.self;
043
044public interface CommandsMixin
045        extends CommandsJsonSchemaMixin {
046
047    default Consumer<Links.Builder> schemaLink() {
048        return links -> {
049        };
050    }
051
052    default Consumer<Links.Builder> commandSelfLink()
053    {
054        return links ->
055        {
056            links.link(self, getUriInfo().getRequestUri().toASCIIString());
057        };
058    }
059
060    default Metadata metadata() {
061        Metadata.Builder metadata = new Metadata.Builder();
062
063        DomainEventMetadata.Builder request = new DomainEventMetadata.Builder(metadata);
064
065        request.timestamp(System.currentTimeMillis());
066
067/* TODO Do this later but set JWT Claims as metadata
068        if ( getSecurityContext().getUserPrincipal() != null )
069        {
070            metadata.set( StandardMetadata.USER, getSecurityContext().getUserPrincipal().getName() );
071
072            if ( getSecurityContext().getUserPrincipal() instanceof RealVisionPrincipal )
073            {
074                RealVisionPrincipal userPrincipal = (RealVisionPrincipal) getSecurityContext().getUserPrincipal();
075
076                userPrincipal.populateMetadata( metadata );
077            }
078        }
079*/
080
081        String forwardedFor = getContainerRequestContext().getHeaderString("X-Forwarded-For");
082
083        if (forwardedFor != null) {
084            String remoteClient = forwardedFor.split(",")[0].trim();
085
086            request.remoteIp(remoteClient);
087        }
088
089        String agent = getContainerRequestContext().getHeaderString(HttpHeaders.USER_AGENT);
090
091        if (agent != null) {
092            request.agent(agent);
093        }
094
095        return metadata.build();
096    }
097
098    // Links
099    default Consumer<Links.Builder> commands(UriBuilder baseUriBuilder, DomainContext context) {
100        return links ->
101        {
102            baseUriBuilder.replaceQuery(null);
103            for (Command command : context.commands()) {
104                if (!Command.isDelete(command.getClass())) {
105                    String commandName = Command.getName(command);
106                    links.link(commandName, baseUriBuilder.replaceQueryParam("rel", commandName).toTemplate());
107                }
108            }
109        };
110    }
111
112    default CompletionStage<ResourceDocument> commandResourceDocument(String rel, String id, DomainContext context) {
113        Command command = context.commands().stream().filter(isCommandByName(rel))
114                .findFirst().orElseThrow(jakarta.ws.rs.NotFoundException::new);
115
116        ObjectNode result = objectMapper().valueToTree(command);
117        result.remove("@class");
118        JsonNode jsonId = result.remove("id");
119        if (jsonId != null && jsonId.isTextual())
120        {
121            id = jsonId.textValue();
122        }
123
124        return CompletableFuture.completedStage(new ResourceDocument.Builder()
125                .links(new Links.Builder().with(commandSelfLink(), schemaLink()))
126                .data(new ResourceObject.Builder(Command.getName(command), id)
127                        .attributes(new Attributes.Builder().with(a ->
128                        {
129                            a.attributes(result);
130                        })).build())
131                .build());
132    }
133
134    default CompletionStage<ResourceDocument> commandResourceDocument(String rel, DomainContext context) {
135        return commandResourceDocument(rel, null, context);
136    }
137
138    default CompletionStage<Response> execute(ResourceObject resourceObject, DomainContext context, Metadata metadata) {
139
140        // Find command based on simple name of class and type in ResourceObject
141        String commandName = resourceObject.getType();
142        Command command = context.commands().stream().filter(isCommandByName(commandName)).map(c ->
143        {
144            Class<? extends Command> commandClass = c.getClass();
145            try {
146                ObjectMapper objectMapper = service(ObjectMapper.class);
147                ObjectNode json = resourceObject.getAttributes().json();
148                json.set("@class", json.textNode(commandClass.getName()));
149                if (resourceObject.getId() != null)
150                    json.set("id", json.textNode(resourceObject.getId()));
151                return objectMapper.<Command>treeToValue(json, objectMapper.constructType(commandClass));
152            } catch (IOException e) {
153                throw new BadRequestException(e);
154            }
155        }).findFirst().orElseThrow(NotFoundException::new);
156
157        // Transfer over ResourceObject.id as aggregate id if not already set
158        if (!metadata.has("aggregateId"))
159        {
160            String id = resourceObject.getId() != null ? resourceObject.getId() : UUIDs.newId();
161            DomainEventMetadata.Builder.aggregateId(id, metadata);
162        }
163
164        return context.handle(metadata, command)
165                .thenApply(md ->
166                {
167                    metadata.getString("aggregateId")
168                            .ifPresent(id -> md.metadata().set("aggregateId", md.metadata().textNode(id)));
169                    return md;
170                })
171                .thenCompose(md -> ok(md, command))
172                .exceptionallyCompose(throwable ->
173                {
174                    while (throwable.getCause() != null) {
175                        throwable = throwable.getCause();
176                    }
177
178                    // Todo integrate with Bean Validation 3.0 here
179                    if (throwable instanceof ConstraintViolationException cve) {
180                        return error(cve);
181                    }
182
183                    return CompletableFuture.failedStage(throwable);
184                });
185    }
186
187    default Predicate<Command> isCommandByName(String name) {
188        return c -> name.equals(Command.getName(c));
189    }
190
191    CompletionStage<ResourceDocument> get(String rel);
192
193    default CompletionStage<Response> ok(Metadata metadata, Command command) {
194        return get(null).thenApply(rd -> Response.ok(rd).build());
195    }
196
197    default CompletionStage<Response> error(ConstraintViolationException e) {
198        Errors.Builder errors = new Errors.Builder();
199        if (!e.getMessage().equals("")) {
200            errors.error(
201                    new Error.Builder().title(e.getMessage())
202                            .build());
203        }
204        for (ConstraintViolation<?> entry : e.getConstraintViolations()) {
205            errors.error(new Error.Builder()
206                    .title(entry.getMessage())
207                    .source(new Source.Builder().pointer("/data/attributes/" + entry.getPropertyPath().toString()).build())
208                    .build());
209        }
210
211        return CompletableFuture.completedStage(Response.status(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST)
212                .entity(new ResourceDocument.Builder().errors(errors.build()).build())
213                .build());
214    }
215}
